programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.desc: Mr. Krabs manufactures Krabby Patties on an industrial scale, but it drives a wedge between SpongeBob and Patrick.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep516
programme.desc: When Leni and her friends start hanging out at Gus's, Lincoln and the gang start a turf war for control. // Lucy gets jealous of Lola's newfound attention after she joins the Mortician's Club.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep517
programme.desc: The kids help Dad track down the mystery person who left Lynn's Table a bad review online. // The Action News Team has to cater to Chandler's demands after he buys the club new equipment.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep80
programme.desc: SpongeBob is going to have the best day ever. But when work, karate, jellyfishing and Squidward's clarinet recital don't go as planned will his day be ruined? // It's Best Friends Day so Patrick and SpongeBob trade presents.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep81
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs and Plankton have been business rivals and bitter enemies for longer than anyone can remember.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep186
programme.desc: After failing again to steal the Krabby Patty formula, Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down. // Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance.

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep212
programme.desc: When Danger Force leaves for an out-of-town mission, Ray calls on the Danger Force Clones for help. He quickly realizes that even though the clones look just like their superhero counterparts, they are very, very different.

programme.title: Henry Danger S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Jasper’s summer camp girlfriend comes to town staying with Charlotte. She quickly becomes jealous thinking Charlotte is in love with Jasper. Charlotte begins to question the girl's sanity.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep304
programme.desc: When Carol Pingrey's photo gets more likes on social media than Lori's she tries to one-up her. // Lola is being temporarily homeschooled. Thinking it looks like fun, the other kids try to get in on it.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Lori and Lincoln visit the city. Lori struggles to be a city girl and Lincoln finds Ronnie Anne has changed. // The family has a new plan to dodge Luan's April Fool's Day pranking: stunt doubles

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep141
programme.desc: Madame Hagfish puts a hex on the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob and Patrick search for a legendary drain on the ocean floor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep142
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick fall into a cavern where frightful Trenchbillies keep them hostage. // Squidward's complaints trigger a volcanic eruption.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep101
programme.desc: While delivering a letter to a house that never gets mail, the gang goes through warfare to get to its front door. // In an attempt to be more like Angus, Parker does the chores and realizes that they're actually boring.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep102
programme.desc: When Angus accidentally throws Burt away, he and Parker must get him back from Greenwood's Recycle King. // After Angus tells Parker and Russell to leave the house on his day off, Parker wrongly assumes it's permanent.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Clyde discovers he didn't earn junior administrator job. But can he give up the perks that come along with it? // When the new girl starts hanging around Lincoln and his friends, they begin to suspect she likes one of them.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep316
programme.desc: The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club but she quickly proves to be too aggressive. // Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown. But her grandparents think it's too dangerous, so they decide to spy on her.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Hoping to win a song-writing contest, Luna contemplates whether she should go with a song that's true to her sound or try to make something that the whole world will love.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Timmy wishes he had a talking car. // Cosmo and Wanda are so busy with Poof they're neglecting Timmy.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Timmy wishes up a machine that allows him to merge with other items to become half-Timmy/half-whatever. // Timmy's tired of technology taking over and ruining his life so he wishes for a simpler world.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep100
programme.desc: Miss Priss, who is against all things fun and delicious, has Krabby Patties banned from Bikini Bottom! // When Stanley, SpongeBob’s klutzy cousin, comes to visit Bikini Bottom, he quickly turns SpongeBob’s life upside down.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep101
programme.desc: When Squidward sees Squilliam on a TV show about fancy homes, Squidward becomes infuriated and tries to outdo him. // When SpongeBob mistakenly thinks that Plankton is starting a band, Plankton decides to use this to his advantage.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep102
programme.desc: When Mr. Krabs sees SpongeBob pick something up off the street, he begins to obsess over the idea that SpongeBob found a penny - a penny that he should have found first! // SpongeBob's boating school class is going on a field trip.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep103
programme.desc: Plankton has demolished the Chum Bucket! In its place, he has built a Roman coliseum. // The Bikini Bottom Symphony is accepting submissions for their composition contest, and Squidward is determined to win.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Alvin's attempts to make money as an internet influencer almost drives a local toy store out of business. // When the Chipmunks accidently ruin Dave's new pavilion, they allow Miss Miller to take the fall.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Alvin's too short to ride an exhilarating new amusement park ride, so he devises a plan to sneak on afterhours. // On a ski trip, Alvin convinces Theodore there's a Yeti nearby, making life miserable for the rest of the family.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep210
programme.desc: When a thick fog rolls into Galloping Grove on the eve of the Hoofsgiving Festival, Corn and Peg help light up the community. // Corn and Peg help Ferdy to play 'Capture The Carrot'.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep201
programme.desc: It's up to the do-gooders observe and compare a lost baby dinosaur's traits in order to reunite him with his mother. // Corn and Peg stumble upon the legendary 'Bighoof'! But to their surprise, there's more to this giant horse than meets the eye.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep118
programme.desc: When Pumpers holds a talent show, SwaySway must overcome his stage fright to perform a love song for Jenny Quackles. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce convince the Bread Maker to lose a wrestling match to Lava Mole.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Brendar faces off against a Royal Order rival, but the result casts doubt about her ability to complete her ultimate quest.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep20
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Grasso vs. Araujo
programme.desc: Prelims - Since moving to the flyweight division, Mexico’s Alexa Grasso has been unstopabble, defeating Ji Yeon Kim, Maycee Barber and Joanne Wood. On October 15 at the APEX in Las Vegas, the Top Five ranked Grasso will make her case for a 125-pound title shot when she battles Brazil’s Viviane Araujo in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night. Also holding down a spot in the flyweight rankings, Araujo has already faced former world titleholders Alexis Davis, Jessica Eye, Roxanne Modafferi and Katlyn Chookagian, and she expects a win over Grasso will earn her a crack at the crown

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Grasso vs. Araujo
programme.desc: Main Event - Since moving to the flyweight division, Mexico’s Alexa Grasso has been unstopabble, defeating Ji Yeon Kim, Maycee Barber and Joanne Wood. On October 15 at the APEX in Las Vegas, the Top Five ranked Grasso will make her case for a 125-pound title shot when she battles Brazil’s Viviane Araujo in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night. Also holding down a spot in the flyweight rankings, Araujo has already faced former world titleholders Alexis Davis, Jessica Eye, Roxanne Modafferi and Katlyn Chookagian, and she expects a win over Grasso will earn her a crack at the crown
